    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),

      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

_a-0000ed08-d796-8000-9dda-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_Filter
_a-0000ed08-d796-8000-9dda-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!fieldValuePairs,
    default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchingCriteria: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!matchingCriteria,
    default: "ALL"
  ),
  local!matchType: a!defaultValue(value: ri!matchType, default: "EXACT"),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_Filter_Reducer(
        matchingCriteria: local!matchingCriteria,
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _,
        matchType: local!matchType
      ),
      a!match(
        value: local!matchingCriteria,
        equals: "ALL",
        then: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
        equals: "ANY",
        then: {},
        default: fn!error(
          "Invalid matchingCriteria, must be one of: ALL, ANY"
        )
      ),
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(value: ri!filterType, default: "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000e825-ca6c-8000-9bf8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSESET_CONTRACT_TYPE,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_ContractType_Map',
  returnType: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!returnType,
    default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!setId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "setId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!setId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: a!defaultValue(value: ri!isActive, default: true()),
      applywhen: ri!showInactive <> true()
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort,
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_BL_checkIfClauseSetIsUpdated
_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  /*Note: Compare rule returns true if the two maps are identical, else returns false*/
  and(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_compare(
      value1: a!map(
        refType: ri!originalClauseSet.refType.refDataId,
        refCategory: ri!originalClauseSet.refCategory.refDataId,
        setNumber: ri!originalClauseSet.setNumber,
        refContractMethod: ri!originalClauseSet.refContractMethod.refDataId,
        clauseSetTemplate: ri!existingClauseSetTemplate,
        templateClauses: ri!existingTemplateClauses,
        clauseSetContractTypes: rule!AS_CO_UT_sortArray(
          array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
            cdt: ri!originalClauseSetContractTypes,
            field: "contractType.contractTypeId"
          )
        ),
        isExistingVehicle: ri!originalClauseSet.isExistingVehicle,
        psc: ri!originalClauseSet.pscCode,
        naicsCode: ri!originalClauseSet.naicsCode,
        estimatedDollarAmount: ri!originalClauseSet.estimatedDollarAmt,
        contractStartDate: ri!originalClauseSet.contractStartDate,
        contractEndDate: ri!originalClauseSet.contractEndDate,
        contractingOfficer: ri!originalClauseSet.contractingOfficer,
        contractingSpecialist: ri!originalClauseSet.contractSpecialist,
        contractingOfficerRep: ri!originalClauseSet.contractingOffcrRep
      ),
      value2: a!map(
        refType: ri!clauseSet.refType.refDataId,
        refCategory: ri!clauseSet.refCategory.refDataId,
        setNumber: ri!clauseSet.setNumber,
        refContractMethod: ri!clauseSet.refContractMethod.refDataId,
        clauseSetTemplate: ri!clauseSetTemplate,
        templateClauses: ri!templateClauses,
        clauseSetContractTypes: rule!AS_CO_UT_sortArray(
          array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
            cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_Filter(
              records: ri!clauseSetContractTypes,
              field: "isActive",
              value: true
            ),
            field: "contractType.contractTypeId"
          )
        ),
        isExistingVehicle: ri!clauseSet.isExistingVehicle,
        psc: ri!clauseSet.pscCode,
        naicsCode: ri!clauseSet.naicsCode,
        estimatedDollarAmount: ri!clauseSet.estimatedDollarAmt,
        contractStartDate: ri!clauseSet.contractStartDate,
        contractEndDate: ri!clauseSet.contractEndDate,
        contractingOfficer: ri!clauseSet.contractingOfficer,
        contractingSpecialist: ri!clauseSet.contractSpecialist,
        contractingOfficerRep: ri!clauseSet.contractingOffcrRep
      )
    ),
    /*Checking if questionnaire is updated - For now, this comparison is used to capture the changes in responses. 
    This needs to be updated in the future inorder to exclude the changes in question labels.*/
    rule!AS_CO_UT_compare(
      value1: ri!originalQuestionnaire.questions,
      value2: ri!questionnaire.questions
    )
  ),
  false,
  true
)

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
          {
            ri!fields,
            index(
              ri!relatedRecordData,
              "relationship",
              null
            )
          }
        ),
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshInterval: ri!refreshInterval,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The main rule to merge the ID-output of a WriteRecords SS node back to the input process variable.

STANDARD USAGE:
- Use this in tandem with rule AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord (see that description)
- In the output of a WriteRecords SS, do:
  A - New Custom Output
  B - rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
        processData: pv![the pv your wrote],
        recordsUpdated: ac!RecordsUpdated,
        fksToParent: {list of record fields that are FKs to the primary PK you wrote}
      )
  C - Save this back to the pv you wrote

MAPPING FKS:
- Using this rule in the current state, child-FKs can only be set 
where they map back to the primary record type, using input "fksToParent".
  -> For example, if you are writing "Case", 
    - you could set "Case.Comment.caseId"
    - you could set "Case.Comment.Replies.caseId"
    - but not "Case.Comment.Replies.commentId" (since the FK "commentId" is not the PK of "Case")
- To set other foreign keys, you would have to run manual update rules using the result of this.
Note:
- "fksToParent" is optimized for 1:M relationships.
  - Setting an fkToParent for a 1:1 will create an instance of that child record if it is null.

IMPORTANT GENERAL NOTES: 
- The result of THIS rule will have data that IS considered changed, 
so a designer should be cautious about re-writing this later in process 
as it could cause race condition and performance side affects.

- Also, the result of this WILL NOT have custom-fields calculated, 
since they can be changed as a result of the write, but this rule is not re-querying.
If you need these, then re-query.

- This should generally only be used for downstream flows that don't write it directly again, 
such as document processing, emails, etc.
*/
if(
  or(
    runtimetypeof(ri!recordsUpdated) = runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated)),
    runtimetypeof(ri!recordsUpdated) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Variant?list'
  ),
  if(
    count(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated)) = 0,
    ri!processData,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated))),
      expression: rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
        processData: a!flatten(ri!processData)[fv!index],
        recordsUpdated: cast(
          runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!processData)),
          ri!recordsUpdated
        )[fv!index],
        fksToParent: ri!fksToParent
      )
    )
  ),
  a!localVariables(
    local!keys: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!keys(ri!recordsUpdated),
      expression: a!map(
        key: fv!item,
        isPrimaryKey: runtimetypeof(fv!item) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}RecordField'
      )
    ),
    local!keysOrganized: rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
      records: local!keys,
      field: "isPrimaryKey",
      value: true,
      filterType: "FULL_RESULT"
    ),
    local!primaryKeyField: local!keysOrganized.firstMatch.key,
    local!updates: rule!AS_GCM_setRecordFields(
      record: ri!processData,
      neverOverwrite: {
        a!map(
          field: local!primaryKeyField,
          value: ri!recordsUpdated[local!primaryKeyField]
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: ri!fksToParent,
          expression: a!map(
            field: fv!item,
            value: ri!recordsUpdated[local!primaryKeyField],
            /*Children get complicated, and an update should only run if a child is actually attached*/
            applyWhen: a!match(
              value: runtimetypeof(ri!processData[fv!item]),
              equals: runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!processData[fv!item])),
              then: count(ri!processData[fv!item]) > 0,
              equals: tointeger(
                'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Variant?list'
              ),
              then: or(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  items: ri!processData[fv!item],
                  expression: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(fv!item)
                )
              ),
              default: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!processData[fv!item])
            )
          )
        )
      },
      childRelationships: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!keysOrganized.rejects,
        expression: a!map(
          field: fv!item.key,
          value: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!processData[fv!item.key]),
            ri!recordsUpdated[fv!item.key],
            rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
              processData: ri!processData[fv!item.key],
              recordsUpdated: ri!recordsUpdated[fv!item.key],
              fksToParent: {}
            )
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    local!updates
  )
)

  recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.name: "Test questionnaire",
  recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.description: "This is a test questionnaire for use in interface default inputs.  Because it is not persisted to the database and exists only in a rule, it may not behave as expected with record actions or other database related operations.",
  recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.questionCategories: {
    recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category(
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.questionCategoryTemplateId: - 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.displayOrder: 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.questionCategoryName: "Category 1",
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.isActive: true()
    ),
    recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category(

      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.displayOrder: 2,

    ),

      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.displayOrder: 3,

    ),

      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.questionCategoryName: "Category 4",
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.isActive: true()
    ),
    recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category(
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.questionCategoryTemplateId: - 5,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.displayOrder: 5,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.questionCategoryName: "Category 5",
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.isActive: true()
    )
  },
  recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.questions: {
    recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question(
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTemplateId: - 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.label: "Minimum 2",
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.groupNumber: 2,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.orderNumber: 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.responseRequirements: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response Requirement(
        recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response Requirement.requirementTypeCode: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENUM_RESPONSE_REQUIREMENT_TYPE_CODE_MIN_RESPONSES,
        recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response Requirement.requirementValue: 2
      ),
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionCategoryTemplateId: - 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.isActive: true(),
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTypeCode: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENUM_QUESTION_TYPE_CODE_SINGLE_RADIO_BUTTON_TEXT,
    ),
    recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question(
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTemplateId: - 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.label: "Question",
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.groupNumber: 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.orderNumber: 1,
      /*isExternalUserFacing: true,*/
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionCategoryTemplateId: - 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.isActive: true(),
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTypeCode: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENUM_QUESTION_TYPE_CODE_SINGLE_RADIO_BUTTON_TEXT,
    ),
    recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question(
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTemplateId: - 3,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.label: "Max 1",
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.groupNumber: 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.orderNumber: 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.responseRequirements: {
        recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response Requirement(
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response Requirement.requirementTypeCode: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENUM_RESPONSE_REQUIREMENT_TYPE_CODE_MAX_RESPONSES,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response Requirement.requirementValue: "1"
        )
      },
      /*isExternalUserFacing: true,*/
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionCategoryTemplateId: - 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.isActive: true,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTypeCode: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENUM_QUESTION_TYPE_CODE_DROPDOWN_TEXT
    ),
    recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question(
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTemplateId: - 4,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.label: "Radio Button Parent Question",
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.groupNumber: 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.orderNumber: 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.responseOptions: {
        recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response(
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response.label: "Yes",
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response.value: "Yes"
        ),
        recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response(
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response.label: "No",
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response.value: "No"
        )
      },
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionCategoryTemplateId: - 3,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.isActive: true,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTypeCode: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENUM_QUESTION_TYPE_CODE_SINGLE_RADIO_BUTTON_TEXT,
    ),
    recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question(
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTemplateId: - 5,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.label: "Radio Button Child Question",
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.groupNumber: 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.orderNumber: 2,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.responseOptions: {
        recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response(
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response.label: "Yes",
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response.value: "Yes"
        ),
        recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response(
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response.label: "No",
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response.value: "No"
        )
      },
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.isDisplayedPrecedentSets: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent Set(
        recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent Set.operator: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENUM_PRECEDENT_OPERATOR_AND,
        recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent Set.questionPrecedents: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent(
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent.questionTemplateId_precedent: - 4,

            recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response Requirement.requirementValue: "Yes"
          )
        )
      ),
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionCategoryTemplateId: - 3,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTypeCode: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENUM_QUESTION_TYPE_CODE_SINGLE_RADIO_BUTTON_TEXT,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.isActive: true
    ),
    recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question(
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTemplateId: - 6,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.label: "Grandchild Question",
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.groupNumber: 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.orderNumber: 3,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.isDisplayedPrecedentSets: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent Set(
        recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent Set.operator: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENUM_PRECEDENT_OPERATOR_AND,
        recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent Set.questionPrecedents: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent(
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent.questionTemplateId_precedent: - 5,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent.responseRequirement: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response Requirement(
            recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response Requirement.requirementTypeCode: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENUM_RESPONSE_REQUIREMENT_TYPE_CODE_SELECTION_INCLUDES,
            recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response Requirement.requirementValue: "Yes"
          )
        )
      ),
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionCategoryTemplateId: - 3,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.isActive: true,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTypeCode: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENUM_QUESTION_TYPE_CODE_DROPDOWN_TEXT
    ),
    recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question(
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTemplateId: - 7,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.label: "Grandchild Question",
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.groupNumber: 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.orderNumber: 4,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.isDisplayedPrecedentSets: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent Set(
        recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent Set.operator: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENUM_PRECEDENT_OPERATOR_AND,
        recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent Set.questionPrecedents: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent(
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent.questionTemplateId_precedent: - 5,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent.responseRequirement: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response Requirement(
            recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response Requirement.requirementTypeCode: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENUM_RESPONSE_REQUIREMENT_TYPE_CODE_SELECTION_INCLUDES,
            recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response Requirement.requirementValue: "Yes"
          )
        )
      ),
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionCategoryTemplateId: - 3,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.isActive: true,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTypeCode: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENUM_QUESTION_TYPE_CODE_DROPDOWN_TEXT
    ),

_a-0000e471-623a-8000-9bc3-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_calculateQuestionFulfilledMetadata
_a-0000e471-623a-8000-9bc3-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!questionMetadata: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_QuestionMetadata'(
    questionId: ri!question.questionId,
    showWhen: ri!questionMetadata.showWhen,
    required: ri!questionMetadata.required,
    valid: ri!questionMetadata.valid,
    fieldMetadata: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!questionMetadata.fieldMetadata,
      expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_FieldMetadata'(
        fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey,
        showWhen: fv!item.showWhen,
        required: fv!item.required,
        valid: fv!item.valid,
        fulfilled: if(
          fv!item.required,
          if(
            fv!item.valid,
            rule!AS_GCM_QNM_UT_fulfilled(
              question: ri!question,
              questionMetadata: ri!questionMetadata,
              fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey
            ),
            false
          ),
          null
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  if(
    ri!questionMetadata.required,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFields(
      cdt: local!questionMetadata,
      fields: "fulfilled",
      newValues: and(
        local!questionMetadata.fieldMetadata.fulfilled
      )
    ),
    local!questionMetadata
  )
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*The main rule to "cleanse" the input of a WriteRecords SS node to remove non-writable relationships.

STANDARD USAGE:
- Use this in tandem with rule AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable (see that description)
- In the input of a WriteRecords SS (NOT in a previous script task), do:
  A - Expressionable input to "Records" intput
  B - rule!AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord(
    records: pv![the pv to write],
    relationships: {list of record relationships that are not allowed to be written}
  )

IMPORTANT GENERAL NOTES: 
- The reason to run this in the input of the WriteRecords SS instead of a previous script task
is that, when used with AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable, you can maintain the relationships
that you had to drop before writing.
  -> For example, if you are writing "Case" but it has a child-relationship "Address" that cannot be written,
    - this will drop "Address" before attempting to write
    - if the output is configured properly it will reattach "Address" in the output
    - the overall result is that you basically ran the node as if "Address" was ignored, 
      so that you can use it later in the process flow
*/
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: a!flatten(ri!records),
  expression: reduce(
    rule!AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord_Reducer(record: _, relationship: _),
    fv!item,
    a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!nonWritableRelationships,
      default: difference(
        rule!AS_GCM_getAllPresentRelationshipsFromRecord(records: fv!item),
        ri!writableRelationships
      )
    )
  )
)

   Used for Headless Amendement Or Modification ClauseSet creation from CW */

    contractTypeMaps: #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
      rule!AS_GCM_BL_getUpdatedContractTypeMaps(
        clauseSetContractTypes: local!initialValues.variable.contractTypeMaps,
        originalClauseSetContractTypes: local!initialValues.variable.originalClauseSetContractTypes
      ),
      "setId",

    ),
    originalContractTypeMaps: local!initialValues.variable.originalContractTypeMaps,
    clauseSetTemplate: #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
      local!initialValues.variable.clauseSetTemplate,
      "setId",

    originalClauseSetTemplate: local!initialValues.variable.originalClauseSetTemplate,

  rule!AS_GAM_createMap(
    keys: local!fieldProperties.fieldIdentifier,
    values: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!fieldProperties,
      expression: a!localVariables(
        local!value: if(
          /*This is a separate Data Type and not nested 

    NOTE: the special handling is not needed when the synced record migration is done for clauseSet*/
          fv!item.fieldIdentifier = "contractTypeMaps",
          ri!contractTypeMaps,
          rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
            cdt: ri!clauseSet,
            field: fv!item.field,
            indexDefault: null
          )
        ),
        local!readOnly: a!match(
          value: fv!item.fieldIdentifier,
          equals: "contractTypeMaps",
          then: false,
          equals: "refCategory",
          then: a!defaultValue(
            value: ri!copyClauseSetClauses,
            default: false
          ),
          whenTrue: and(
            fv!value = "refContractFormat",
            rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(ri!copyClauseSetClauses)
          ),
          then: true,
          default: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
            property(
              ri!clauseSetContext,
              fv!item.contextProperty
            )
          )
        ),
        local!required: a!match(
          value: fv!item.fieldIdentifier,
          equals: "setNumber",
          equals: "refType",
          equals: "refContractFormat",
          then: true,
          equals: "refCategory",
          then: if(ri!copyClauseSetClauses, false, true),
          equals: "categoryNumber",
          then: or(
            contains(
              {
                cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_AMENDMENT,
                cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_MODIFICATION
              },
              tointeger(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                  cdt: ri!clauseSet,
                  field: rule!AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField(
                    cdtOrRecord: local!fieldProperties,
                    field: "fieldIdentifier",
                    value: "refCategory"
                  ).field,
                  indexDefault: null
                )
              )
            ),
            contains(
              {
                cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_AMENDMENT,
                cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_MODIFICATION
              },
              tointeger(
                index(
                  ri!clauseSetContext,
                  rule!AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField(
                    cdtOrRecord: local!fieldProperties,
                    field: "fieldIdentifier",
                    value: "refCategory"
                  ).contextProperty,
                  null
                )
              )
            )
          ),
          equals: "contractingOfficer",
          /*Its not required when Clause set is created from GCW or Contract Specialist is selected in GCA*/
          then: and(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!clauseSetContext),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                cdt: ri!clauseSet,
                field: rule!AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField(
                  cdtOrRecord: local!fieldProperties,
                  field: "fieldIdentifier",
                  value: "contractSpecialist"
                ).field
              )
            )
          ),
          equals: "contractSpecialist",
          /*Its not required when Clause set is created from GCW or Contracting Officer is selected in GCA*/
          then: and(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!clauseSetContext),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                cdt: ri!clauseSet,
                field: rule!AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField(
                  cdtOrRecord: local!fieldProperties,
                  field: "fieldIdentifier",
                  value: "contractingOfficer"
                ).field
              )
            )
          ),
          equals: "isExistingVehicle",
          /*Its not required when Clause set is created from GCW */
          then: a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!clauseSetContext),
          default: false
        ),
        local!isRequiredValidationViolated: if(
          and(local!required, not(local!readOnly)),
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(value: local!value),
          false
        ),
        local!isCharacterLimitExceeded: if(
          or(
            local!readOnly,
            a!isNullOrEmpty(fv!item.charcterLimit),
            /*
                  This is a separate Data Type and not nested 

    NOTE: the special handling is not needed when the synced record migration is done for clauseSet
    */
            fv!item.fieldIdentifier = "contractTypeMaps"
          ),
          false,
          len(local!value) > fv!item.charcterLimit
        ),
        local!isSelectionLimitExceeded: if(
          a!isNotNullOrEmpty(fv!item.maxSelections),
          rule!AS_GAM_UT_ArrayLength(array: local!value) > fv!item.maxSelections,
          false
        ),
        rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
          cdt: fv!item,
          fieldValuePairs: {
            a!map(field: "readOnly", value: local!readOnly),
            a!map(field: "required", value: local!required),
            a!map(
              field: "isRequiredValidationViolated",
              value: local!isRequiredValidationViolated
            ),
            a!map(
              field: "isCharacterLimitExceeded",
              value: local!isCharacterLimitExceeded
            ),
            a!map(
              field: "isSelectionLimitExceeded",
              value: local!isSelectionLimitExceeded
            ),
            a!map(
              /*  This field is to check if the field has any validation errors. 
Used to filter to find fields with validation erros associated to a section            */
              field: "hasValidationErrors",
              value: or(
                local!isRequiredValidationViolated,
                local!isCharacterLimitExceeded,
                local!isSelectionLimitExceeded,
                rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: fv!item.validations)
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e471-623a-8000-9bc3-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!questionMetadata: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_QuestionMetadata'(
    questionId: ri!question.questionId,
    showWhen: ri!questionMetadata.showWhen,
    required: if(
      ri!questionMetadata.showWhen,
      rule!AS_GCM_QNM_UT_required(
        question: ri!question,
        applicableQuestions: ri!applicableQuestions,
        applicableQuestionsMetadata: ri!applicableQuestionsMetadata,
        fieldKey: null
      ),
      false
    ),
    fieldMetadata: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!questionMetadata.fieldMetadata,
      expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_FieldMetadata'(
        fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey,
        showWhen: fv!item.showWhen,
        required: if(
          fv!item.showWhen,
          rule!AS_GCM_QNM_UT_required(
            question: ri!question,
            applicableQuestions: ri!applicableQuestions,
            applicableQuestionsMetadata: ri!applicableQuestionsMetadata,
            fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey
          ),
          false
        ),
        valid: if(
          fv!item.showWhen,
          rule!AS_GCM_QNM_UT_validate(
            question: ri!question,
            fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey
          ),
          null
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  if(
    ri!questionMetadata.showWhen,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFields(
      cdt: local!questionMetadata,
      fields: "valid",
      newValues: and(
        local!questionMetadata.fieldMetadata.valid
      )
    ),
    local!questionMetadata
  )
)
